column4: Hey Jordan_U. After running those commands you gave me.. I restarted my computer, but I still get the, "error: the symbol 'grub-xputs' not found"
does that mean my Windows partition is pretty much screwed at this point? Jordan_U? Or can I still recover my Windows partition?
lol ya hold on.. now I'm trying to re-boot through my USB (LIVEUSB) and now it's ignoring it.. I love it.
